name: Made In Real Life
description: MIRL is a next-generation project that brings the fashion industry into the metaverse, with designer NFTs, real-world wearables and talented emerging artists. We aim to provide NFT owners with the opportunity to showcase their art both digitally and physically. The MIRL Project also aims to support, empower, and curate aspiring new designers in the metaverse. The MIRL ecosystem consists of not just the NFTs, but a DAO and Incubation program for new designers. This movement could support many different artists that are new to the space, as well as create a new FashionFi economy.
